tooltipNotAvailable.message: Purchases from this region are currently not allowed.

countryListCustom.message: You can customize the countries you want to be displayed by adding them to this list. When you make changes to the list the default countries will be replaced. If you want to return to the default countries you can 'Reset default countries'. You can also view the country codes by clicking on 'Show country codes'.

tableCountryCodeInfo.message: It is important to indicate correctly the country code. This code is responsible for indicating the corresponding country and price.

contact.message: For any suggestions, problems or information, please contact me at
